scripts.airdrop: cd ../token/airdrop && truffle test ./script/doAirdropFromOptions.js &&cd ../../dao-contracts && npm run show-balances
scripts.start: npm run docker && npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular && npm run airdrop
scripts.start-test: npm run docker && npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular && npm run airdrop && npm run test
scripts.restart: npm run docker-restart && npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular && npm run airdrop
scripts.restart-test: npm run docker-restart && npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular && npm run airdrop && npm run test
scripts.airdrop-rinkeby: cd ../token/airdrop && truffle test ./script/doAirdropFromOptions.js --network rinkeby &&cd ../../dao-contracts && npm run show-balances-rinkeby
scripts.start-rinkeby: npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular-rinkeby && npm run airdrop-rinkeby
scripts.start-test-rinkeby: npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular-rinkeby && npm run airdrop-rinkeby && npm run test-rinkeby
